name: portfolio-puppy
description: This is a website for dogs

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.imagemin: imagemin assets/img/* -o assets/dist/img && imagemin assets/img/heroes/* -o dist/assets/heroes/img
scripts.usemin: usemin aboutus.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/aboutus.html && usemin contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html && usemin dog1.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/dog1.html && usemin dog2.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/dog2.html && usemin dog3.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/dog3.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin post1.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/post1.html && usemin post2.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/post2.html && usemin post3.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/post3.html && usemin training-level-one.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/training-level-one.html && usemin training-level-two.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/training-level-two.html && usemin training-level-three.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/training-level-three.html && usemin training-levels.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/training-levels.html

author: Lore
